name: picturesqueness
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
(especially of a place) the quality of being attractive in appearance, especially in an old-fashioned way: Several of the lakes are celebrated for the picturesqueness of their surrounding scenery. The frozen lake complements the picturesqueness of Reykjavik's historic centre. See
picturesque
More examplesFewer examplesThere is no shortage of picture books showing the city in all its postcard picturesqueness.There is a certain rugged picturesqueness which we cannot help but admire.With the railroads drawing near, much of the picturesqueness of the old life was gone.
